item.description:
Saturday, April 2nd  Charity Comedy Night,

Hilton Hotel Hartford CT
Comedy night to benefit the Connecticut Leukemia

and Lymphoma Society in memory of Dillon Wilson.

The event is being held at the Hartford Hilton in their

Grand Ballroom. The night will begin with a silent
auction and social hour and cash bar at 7pm, followed by the
comedians, and ending with dancing until midnight.

Jaycee members get $5 off ticket price, please purchase your

ticket in advance and you will be reimbursed afterwards. 

To purchase your tickets: http://dwcomedy.com.s88254.gridserver.com/
item.name: Charity Comedy Night
